name: nonpoisonous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a substance) not able to cause illness or death if taken into the body: We should replace the acid with a nonpoisonous substance. The lorry was delivering a load of non-poisonous chemicals.
(of an animal or insect) not using poison in order to defend itself: Several nonpoisonous snakes live in the forest. Although they are non-poisonous, they can still give you a painful bite.
More examplesFewer examplesThe powder is produced from the dried berries of a nonpoisonous shrub.Most of the villagers can tell the difference between a poisonous and nonpoisonous snake.Poisonous species have bright warning colours, which are sometimes copied by nonpoisonous species.
